data.actual_result: You hear the noise, meaning that the keybind works in that window
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to hear the push to mute noise since keybinds are disabled in that window
data.short_description: Push To Mute keybind works in the keybind menu despite the "Keybind are disabled while the panel is open"
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Keybinds - and set a keybind for push to mute I used (Numpad /) - once set, press it - hear the push to mute noise
